page: CS69013: Programming And Data Structures Lab

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: (i) Familiarization of a computer and the environment and execution of sample programs (ii) Expression evaluation (iii) Conditionals and branching, (iv) Iteration (v) Functions (vi) Recursion (vii) Arrays (viii) Structures (ix) Linked lists (x) Data structures. It is suggested that some problems related to continuous domain problems in engineering and their numerical solutions be given as laboratory assignments.
